criterioFRequest.descripcionCriterio: Haber asesorado o co-asesorado un número mínimo de tesis sustentadas de pregrado y/o posgrado, en el caso de GCM, haber liderado o estar liderando un grupo de investigación o laboratorio de investigación

datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Coordinador del Grupo de Investigación Flows, Particles, Combustion and Environment (FPCE), PUCP

datosLaboralesPOJO.cargo: CONSULTANT IN RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
Research work performed in several projects, including:
Project (1): Development of Software (Computational Tool) for Thermomechanical
Diagnostics of Gas Turbines, Company: Petrobras SA
Project (2): Development of System for Online Dynamic Simulation of Power Plants
Operating Conditions, Company: UTE Norte Fluminense SA (EDF Group)

datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: PONTIFÍCIA UNIVERSIDADE CATÓLICA DO RIO DE JANEIRO (PUC-RIO)
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
Research work carried out in several areas including Turbulent Combustion, Turbulent
Reacting Flow Modelling, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Large Eddy Simulation,
Probability Density Function (PDF) Methods and Parallel Computing
Research work on emissions formation modelling

Project (1): Clean Sky Joint Technology Initiative (JTI), Systems for Green Operations
(SGO) Integrated Technology Demonstrator (ITD), Company: European Commission
Project (2): Development of a 130-seat Airliner: Aircraft and Jet Engine Design,
Company: China Aviation Industry Corporation I (AVIC I)
Project (3): Research leadership in two MSc and PhD projects: (i) Aircraft trajectory optimization,
and (ii) Emissions formation modelling, Higher Education Institution: Cranfield University

Work carried out in several R&D projects related to the improvement of gas turbines performance
Project (1): Development of Tool for Monitoring and Diagnostics of Performance of Gas Turbines, Company: UTE Norte Fluminense SA (EDF Group)
Project (2): Power Augmentation Technologies for Gas Turbines, Company: UTE Norte
Fluminense SA (EDF Group)

datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: PONTIFÍCIA UNIVERSIDADE CATÓLICA DO RIO DE JANEIRO (PUC-RIO)
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
Research lines:
Applied Aerodynamics, Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), Aircraft Air Inlets, Vortex Generators

Work carried out in several projects including the following two: Feasibility Study of the
Gas Pipeline Camisea-Cusco (Company: Yura S.A.) and Study of the Positioning and
Installation Alternatives of a Combined Cycle Power Plant using Natural Gas (Company:
Enersur)
